com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm
Class ModelMap

java.lang.Object
  com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.ModelMap
Direct Known Subclasses:
RestfulModelMap, SqliteModelMap
public abstract class ModelMap
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a domain model instance mapped to a database table.

Version:
1.0 02/23/12
Author:
Tyler Treat
